errors.error_description: States that Qibo requires Python 2.7, which is outdated and incompatible with modern quantum computing libraries
correction_candidates: Qibo requires Python 3.8 or later for optimal performance
Qibo supports Python 3.6+ with some features requiring 3.9+
Remove the Python version requirement statement entirely
Qibo requires Python 3.7 or later with NumPy 1.19+
errors.golden_answer: Qibo requires Python 3.8 or later for optimal performance
